####**Does the store distance affect the customer spending and their order methods?**

**Part 2** - StoreDis vs Customer Spending

**Part 2.1** Dollars Spent
```{r, echo=FALSE, out.width = 300, out.height= 300, fig.retina = NULL, fig.align='center'}

model1 <- lm(sum_dollar_total~StoreDist)

```
